minidraw.standard
Class AbstractFigure

java.lang.Object
  minidraw.standard.AbstractFigure
All Implemented Interfaces:
Figure
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompositeFigure, ImageFigure
public abstract class AbstractFigure
extends java.lang.Object
implements Figure

Abstract Figure: Base implementation of some Figure behaviour. Responsibilities: A) All observer role "Subject" base functionality is provided. Code partly copied from JHotDraw 5.1. Author: Henrik Bærbak Christensen

Move the figure by a delta (dx, dy).

willChange

protected void willChange()
Informes that a figure is about to change something that affects the contents of its display box.

invalidate

public void invalidate()
Description copied from interface: Figure
Invalidates the figure. This method informs the listeners that the figure's current display box is invalid and should be refreshed.

Specified by:
invalidate in interface Figure

basicMoveBy

protected abstract void basicMoveBy(int dx,
                                    int dy)
This is the hook method to be overridden when a figure moves. Do not call directly, instead call 'moveBy'.

changed

public void changed()
Description copied from interface: Figure
Informes that a figure has changed its display box. This method also triggers an update call for its registered observers.
